entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
